enableMessages.name: Enable Messages
enableMessages.description: Send a message with the explanation of a timeout/ban.

timeoutDuration.name: Timeout Duration
timeoutDuration.description: Base duration of an infraction timeout (in seconds)

timeoutMultiplier.name: Timeout Multiplier
timeoutMultiplier.description: Multiplier for each next warning (base * multiplier ^ warnings)

timeoutWarnings.name: Max Warnings
timeoutWarnings.description: Maximum amount of warnings before banning (0 - instant ban)

timeoutCooldown.name: Timeout Cooldown
timeoutCooldown.description: Amount of time after which warnings are forgotten (in seconds)

banDuration.name: Ban Duration
banDuration.description: Duration of a ban (in seconds, 0 - permanent)

bannedWordMessage.name: Banned Word Message
bannedWordMessage.description: Format of a banned word notification.
bannedWordMessage.default: <%username%> > You can't use that word here! (<%type%>, <%duration%>s)

bannedLinkMessage.name: Banned Link Message
bannedLinkMessage.description: Format of a banned link notification.
bannedLinkMessage.default: <%username%> > You can't link that website here! (<%type%>, <%duration%>s)
